channel.title: CVE Feed for CubeWP -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for CubeWP -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-47300|2024-10-07T13:08:19.026Z -- cubewp -- cubewp%20forms%20%E2%80%93%20all-in-one%20form%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CubeWP CubeWP Forms – All-in-One Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CubeWP Forms – All-in-One Form Builder: from n/a through 1.1.1.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CubeWP CubeWP Forms – All-in-One Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CubeWP Forms – All-in-One Form Builder: from n/a through 1.1.1.
